text: The same problem is present in P4Reopen.setToChange() and P4Revert.setChange()

This has been fixed in SVN on 2005-12-05 11:06:14 -0600 by Martijn Kruithof.
The fix is present in Ant 1.7.0Beta3 and will be present in all future releases.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 37765 ***
creator: antoine@apache.org
